evidence.claim: McGinley Orthopedics deals with health tech regulations including HIPAA compliance.
The company engages with X12 transaction sets for healthcare data exchange.
FHIR standards are relevant in McGinley Orthopedics' data exchange practices.
HL7 is utilized by McGinley Orthopedics to ensure interoperability within health systems.

icp.icp_reason: No clear evidence of using X12 or EDI for healthcare transactions on their site.
